text: An la she ge biyu:[Yige xinshi he yige bu xinyang zhe], yige shi shou guanzhi de nuli [bu xinyang zhe], ta buneng ziyou chuli renhe shi; ling yige shi wo ciyu jiamei jiyang zhe [xinshi], ta keyi anzhong he gongkai shiyong [ziji de shou ci wu]. Zhe liang ren shi yiyang de ma? Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la. Dan tamen da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
